option.name: originalContent
option.value:
Habit2Goal
Features Screens Download FAQ Contact
Get the App

Turn daily habits into achievable goals

Structure your routine, visualize progress, and stay motivated with data-driven insight across platforms.

Get it on Google Play Download on the App Store

Everything you need to stay consistent

Create & Refine Goals

Define clear goals and structure them through repeatable, measurable habits. Adjust dynamically as you learn.

Daily Habit Tracking

Log your progress effortlessly each day. Visual signals guide momentum and streak integrity.

Goal Progress Timeline

Explore historical progress and completion history to understand long‑term patterns.

Rich Statistics

Dive into dedicated stats screens: Day, Habit, Goal, and cumulative analytics to fine‑tune routines.

Positive & Negative Values

Support for habits with increasing or decreasing target values; color feedback highlights direction.

Completion Insights

Celebrate completed goals and learn from the path that got you there with review overlays.

Cross‑Platform Foundation

Built with Kotlin Multiplatform + Compose. Consistent logic across Android & iOS (desktop ready).

Dark & Light Themes

Adaptive color system for clarity and accessibility in all lighting conditions.

Privacy Respect

Your data stays on your device. Future optional sync will remain transparent & opt‑in.

App Screens

Below are current screen previews. Replace SVG placeholders with actual PNG/WebP exports when ready.

From intention to execution

Habit2Goal bridges the gap between what you plan and what you actually do. By tightly integrating habit loops with long‑term targets, it enables meaningful progress without overwhelm.

  • Clarity: see exactly what moves each goal forward.
  • Focus: highlight the next impactful action.
  • Motivation: visual momentum & completion feedback.
  • Insight: granular stats per day, habit & goal.
  • Adaptation: iterate goals as habits evolve.

Frequently Asked Questions

When will the app be available?

Public store links will appear here once review passes. Current build targets Android & iOS.

Does it require an account?

No account required for core tracking. Future sync will be optional.

Will my data sync across devices?

Planned as an opt‑in encrypted feature. Local‑first remains the default.

Is there a dark mode?

Yes. Automatic based on system preference with accessible contrast ratios.

Habit2Goal

Turn daily habit energy into goal momentum. Multi‑platform. Privacy‑respecting. Data‑driven.

Explore Features Screens Download FAQ
Legal Privacy Policy Terms of Use Imprint
Connect Email GitHub Twitter
© Habit2Goal. All rights reserved.

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
Habit2Goal
FeaturesScreensDownloadFAQ
Get the App

Privacy Policy

Last updated:

Habit2Goal is designed as a local‑first habit & goal tracking application. This policy explains what (minimal) data is collected and how it is used.

1. Data Storage

All habit, goal and statistics data you enter is stored locally on your device. It is never transmitted to our servers because we do not operate any backend for core features.

2. Accounts

No account or sign‑in is required. Future optional sync features (if released) will be opt‑in and covered by an updated version of this policy.

3. Analytics & Tracking

The app currently does not include third‑party analytics SDKs. If lightweight privacy‑respecting analytics are introduced later, you will be able to opt out.

4. Permissions

Only essential platform permissions are requested. The app does not access contacts, location, microphone, or photos unless a feature explicitly needs it and you grant consent.

5. Third‑Party Services

App store distribution (Google Play / Apple App Store) may collect anonymized metrics per their own policies.

6. Children

The app is not directed to children under 13. If you are a guardian and believe data was provided by a child, contact us for deletion steps.

7. Your Rights

You can delete all data at any time by uninstalling the app. A future in‑app data export / wipe tool is planned.

8. Changes

Policy updates will be posted on this page with an updated date.

9. Contact

Email: contact@example.com

Habit2Goal

Turn daily habit energy into goal momentum.

ExploreFeaturesScreensDownloadFAQ
LegalPrivacy PolicyTerms of UseImprint
ConnectEmail
© Habit2Goal

Privacy Policy

Habit2Goal is designed as a local‑first habit & goal tracking application. This policy explains what (minimal) data is collected and how it is used.

1. Data Storage

All habit, goal and statistics data you enter is stored locally on your device. It is never transmitted to our servers because we do not operate any backend for core features.

2. Accounts

No account or sign‑in is required. Future optional sync features (if released) will be opt‑in and covered by an updated version of this policy.

3. Analytics & Tracking

The app currently does not include third‑party analytics SDKs. If lightweight privacy‑respecting analytics are introduced later, you will be able to opt out.

4. Permissions

Only essential platform permissions are requested. The app does not access contacts, location, microphone, or photos unless a feature explicitly needs it and you grant consent.

5. Third‑Party Services

App store distribution (Google Play / Apple App Store) may collect anonymized metrics per their own policies.

6. Children

The app is not directed to children under 13. If you are a guardian and believe data was provided by a child, contact us for deletion steps.

Habit2Goal
Features Screens Download FAQ
Get the App

Terms of Use

Last updated:

These Terms govern your use of the Habit2Goal application ("App"). By installing or using the App you agree to be bound by them.

1. License

You receive a personal, non‑transferable, revocable license to use the App for personal productivity purposes.

2. Acceptable Use

Do not misuse the App, attempt to reverse engineer proprietary components, or use it for unlawful activity.

3. Ownership

All intellectual property rights to the App (excluding your entered data) remain with the developer.

4. Warranty Disclaimer

The App is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. Use is at your own risk.

5. Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law, liability is limited to the amount you paid (if any) for the App.

6. Data

Your data is stored locally on your device. See the Privacy Policy.

7. Updates

Features may change or be discontinued at any time. Continued use signifies acceptance of modifications.

8. Termination

Failure to comply with these Terms may result in termination of your license to use the App.

9. Governing Law

Applicable jurisdiction will be that of the developer's place of residence unless local mandatory law provides otherwise.

10. Contact

Email: contact@nowakapps.dev
